title: Survey on regretting tattoos in the U.S. 2015
summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response No and lowest at Response Yes.
The Share of respondents of Response Yes is 3.35% smaller than the maximum value at No.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 2 number of Responses.
Response No has the highest Share of respondents and Yes has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response No and lowest at Response Yes.
The Share of respondents of Response Yes is 3.35% smaller than the maximum value at No.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 2 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response No and lowest at Response Yes.
There is a difference of 54.0 between the maximum Response No and minimum Response Yes.
The average Share of respondents in all 2 Responses is 50.0.
